page.title: 05CARR HILL INDUSTRY DONCASTER
page.content: The main source of employment in the area: it consists of metal manufacturing and engineering firms with offices running along a single road from Carr Hill down Balby Carr Bank. Peglers factory chimmney towers over the area. The marshland is cheap and the opening of the M18 has made communications excellent. The main firms are: {PEGLER HATTERSLEY GROUP}- employs 1300 locally - shower fittings, taps, engineering valves. {BRIDON LTD (BRITISH ROPES)}- employs 1250 - steel wire products with offices and subsidiary units for Danite Hard Metals and Darlington Fencing. {MINING SUPPLIES LTD}- employs 1375 - special engineering design. {INTERNATIONAL HARVESTERS}- tractors and farming equipment.
